name: Rogue Force
description:
Prototype Level 1 demo of a campaign.



PREVIEW:

"In-the-making" video (spoilers - preferably wait until you've tried the level if you're curious.)











GAMEPLAY CONCEPT: MANNABLE TURRETS:







Mission is playable and completable, including cut-scenes.



BUGS:

\- Your Marine Commander and units can actually walk through the Security Gate before it opens currently - DON'T DO IT, PRESERVE THE ILLUSION! D,:



\- Auto-Turrets are meant to be Mannable Turrets but it's not yet implemented.



\- Possibly one or two things I missed.



\- Many things yet to be implemented.



Please enjoy.
author: supermudz
